pcf.quasiparticle.aws.ec2_route53 package¶

Submodules¶

pcf.quasiparticle.aws.ec2_route53.ec2_route53 module¶

class pcf.quasiparticle.aws.ec2_route53.ec2_route53.EC2Route53(particle_definition)¶

Bases: pcf.core.quasiparticle.Quasiparticle

This quasiparticle maps as many ec2 particles that you specify with the multiplier and adds them to the route53 record.

flavor = 'ec2_route53'¶
set_parents()¶

Adds all ec2 particles as parents to the route53 particle.
